item.description:
We suffer far more than necessary by over-identifying with the ego. We are so much more than our separate self and our desires and defenses. Learn practical tips to experience yourself beyond your individuality and therefore live a happier life.

Delicious macrobiotic meal by chef David Snieckus for an additonal $20, show up anytime 7 to 8:30pm

8:30 pm - 10 pm workshop
($30 - Sliding scale to $15)

Herb Pearce, M.Ed., is an Enneagram expert, author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and has taught 2000 workshops on this topic. He is a therapist and personal coach and he is coming out with a new eBook soon on Herb's Tips for Living: A Manual for Enjoying Yourself on the Earth.

www.herbpearce.com
herb@herbpearce.com
781 648 3737
item.name: Let Go of Ego
